name: SupplyPlan
description: Displays the supply plan generated by AWS Supply Chain Supply Planning.

fields.name: supply_plan_id
fields.description: Supply Plan ID

fields.name: connection_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the data source (i.e. connection). Auto populated by ASC.

fields.name: plan_uuid
fields.description: Unique plan identifier generated by application. To be used if separate from supply_plan_id

fields.name: snapshot_date
fields.description: Date-time till when data is collected

fields.name: creation_date
fields.description: Date-time when plan was created

fields.name: tpartner_id
fields.description: ID of trading partner. E.g. Contract Manufacturer, or supplier in n-tier network

fields.name: to_site_id
fields.description: Destination site associated with supply plan

fields.name: from_site_id
fields.description: Source / origin site associated with supply plan

fields.name: plan_need_by_date
fields.description: Future date-time by when supply is needed at to_site_id (or date-time when ownership switches to company). May be same as plan_window_end.

fields.name: plan_quantity
fields.description: Planned quantity

fields.name: commit_date
fields.description: Date committed by tpartner aganist the plan_date

fields.name: commit_quantity
fields.description: Quantity committed by tpartner

fields.name: supply_upside
fields.description:
Upside capacity published by supplier

Suppliers typically publish their upside capacities. so that customers can make use of those

fields.name: plan_type
fields.description: Type of plan. E.g. Forecast Commit, Supplier Plan. E.g. if plan_type is commit, then quantity represents committed qty

fields.name: plan_window_start
fields.description: If plan corresponds to a planning bucket or window in application, stores the start of the planning window.

fields.name: plan_window_end
fields.description: If plan corresponds to a planning bucket or window in application, stores the end of the planning window.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source of data

fields.name: db_creation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was created

fields.name: db_updation_dttm
fields.description: Internal audit field - stores when the record was last updated

fields.name: production_process_id
fields.description: ID associated with specific production process

fields.name: plan_cycle_sequence
fields.description: sequence number of plan cycle the order will be in

fields.name: quantity_uom
fields.description: UOM associated with quantity

fields.name: plan_id
fields.description: Recurring plan that covers multiple supply plan records
